You are my only son.
The property entered in the following schedule is my ancestral property. That is, the property in my possession and full rights since forever, namely, the property in the Karapa Mandal, Pedakottur Gram Panchayat Area, Yandamuru Suburb, Pedakottur Revenue Village Taluk, Survey No. 26/
2, measuring 94.22 sq. m., and the place of residence is their assessment no. 54, door no. 1- 54 The bungalow with its entire structure has become a complete ruin, and the house has been completely demolished, leaving the remaining vacant land measuring 94.22 sq. m. as per the schedule below, relating to the said door number, from that date to this day. You are my only son. Therefore, out of my filial love and affection for you, and considering my love and affection for you as a reward, I hereby transfer to you, free of charge, the property listed in the following schedule, which has been in my possession and possession up to this date, free of charge, and I hereby execute this settlement deed in your name, and I hereby physically take possession of the property to you on this very day. You have taken possession of the property from me. I hereby transfer to you all the rights that have been inherited by me in the property listed in the following schedule. Therefore, from now on, you shall be the full rightful owner of the property as set out in the Schedule below, paying all property taxes, etc., and enjoying all the full rights of donation, sale, and inheritance, and you, your sons, daughters, and grandchildren, shall enjoy it freely and happily for all time.

Whatever disputes or disputes may arise between my people regarding this matter, whether they arise from anyone or from me, I, my heirs, you, or your heirs, will settle them all at my own expense and implement them without interruption according to this Settlement Document.

I hereby convey to you the property as per the schedule below free of charge and hereby declare that I have not made any other transactions, purchase agreements, donations, mortgages, guarantees or other encumbrances to anyone except by writing and giving this settlement deed in your name today. Balla Subbarao Nishani

Declaration of the person who read
This document is a document in which I have submitted all the necessary details including the title deeds, tax receipts and government issued identity documents of the property to the undersigned. I hereby register this deed in the name of the undersigned, believing that I have not transferred/transferred/registered the property in this deed to anyone before and that no one else has any right to transfer the said property except me. The Sub-Registrar, his office staff or the draftsman shall not have any relation or responsibility in relation to this deed, which is being registered on this day. The deed has been prepared and registered only on the basis of the details furnished by me. I hereby declare that I am able to register and issue amendments/agreements/supplementary documents to this document as required and without delay, without seeking any compensation from the parties, whenever required. I hereby declare that all the information I have provided is true and that I will be fully responsible for any and all legal actions taken in connection with such information in the future. I hereby declare that the property described in this deed belongs to me alone, that I have not previously alienated the said property to any person, and that I shall be liable to the punishment prescribed in Section 82 of the Registration Act, 1908, if I am found to have violated the provisions of Section 22 (B) of the Registration Act, 1908. B. Raju

sections.content: The property covered under Gift Settlement Deed No. 322 of 2026, dated 22/Jan/2026, executed by Balla Subbarao, in favour of his Son, Balla Raju, towards the property admeasuring an extent of 94.22 Sq. Yds., Dismantled house number 1-54, Assessment No. 54, comprised in survey number 26/2, situated in Yandamuru sivaru Pedakothuru Revenue Village, Pedakothuru Gramapanchayat, Karapa Mandal, Erstwhile West Godavari, now within the District of Kakinada, registered at sub-registrar office Tallarevu is bounded as follows: North by: 32.0 Ft. (or) 9.75 Mt. House of Balla Nageswara Rao South by: 32.0 Ft (or) 9.75 Mt. House of Balla Rajyalakshmi East by: 26.5 Ft. (or) 8.07 Mt. Some Extent of Pathway, Some Extent House of Balla Dhanamma West by: 26.5 Ft. (or) 8.07 Mt. House of Balla Chantibabu
It is noted from the given documents and EC that the schedule property is not part of any active Mortgage or Lease Deed.

NoteIt is to be noted that there is mismatch with the Rajyalakshmi, between Deed and Rajeswari in the EC, it is, therefore advisable for F.I. to obtain updated EC as per Deed. Further, It is to be noted that the online EC has been verified using the key parameters, namely the Document Number, Survey Number/House Number of the concerned SRO, as per the Deed. However, cross-verification across multiple SROs has not been carried out due to the AP portal’s requirement of separate passwords for each search parameter, and the OTP-based authentication mechanism makes searches across multiple SROs operationally infeasible.
